name: GumTales
description:
This game is a school project of a first class student of the htk academy. 

In this game you play the character Gumball whose task is to collect 10 keys to open a portal. However, various opponents stand in his way.

With Gumballs movement you will succeed in conquering the individual levels.

Good luck!

CREDITS / SPECIAL THANKS

But it wasn't only my work. I got supported by very cool people, who helped me fixing bugs and helped my graphics look more beautiful. 

Without these people i wouldnt be able to finish this project like it is now. 

Huge thanks to you guys!

Tronik - Kevin 

Skorpjun - Mats

Jessy - Jasmin
